item.title: Next Africa: Practice What You Preach Is Lesson for Zimbabwe
item.description: Zimbabwe’s New President Faces Tough Challenges Zimbabwe’s new president, Emmerson Mnangagwa, has a lot of work to do. He has promised to revive the country’s economy and restore its reputation, but he will need to walk the talk if he wants to succeed.
